  • Constructor Details

    • DetokenizationDictionary

      public DetokenizationDictionary(String[] tokens, DetokenizationDictionary.Operation[] operations)
      Initializes a DetokenizationDictionary instance.
      Parameters:
      tokens - An array of tokens that should be de-tokenized according to operations.
      operations - An array of operations which specifies which operation should be used for the provided tokens.

    • DetokenizationDictionary

      public DetokenizationDictionary(InputStream in) throws IOException
      Initializes a DetokenizationDictionary instance via a valid InputStream.
      Parameters:
      in - The InputStream used for loading the dictionary.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if IO errors occurred during initialization.

      public void serialize(OutputStream out) throws IOException
      Serializes the current state of a DetokenizationDictionary via an output stream.
      Parameters:
